titleStmt.title: Rules and advices to the clergy of the diocesse of [blank] for their deportment in their personal and publick capacities. Given by the Bishop at the visitation.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Crook, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by John North, book-seller in Castle-Street,
